raw: S o p h i a   Bö h m  Personal Information  Gender Female Age 40 Nationality German Location Graz, Austria  Education  Ph.D. in Data Science Technical University of Munich, Germany  Master's in Computer Science Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich, Germany  Bachelor's in Mathematics University of Vienna, Austria  Experience  Associate Professor of Data Science Department of Computer Science, TU Graz  Taught undergraduate and graduate courses in data science, machine learning, and statistical  analysis.  Supervised graduate students' research projects and theses in various areas of data science.  Conducted research in collaboration with industry partners on applied data science projects. January 2019 – Present (5 years) Graz, Austria  Assistant Professor of Computer Science Technical University of Munich  Taught courses in data mining, big data analytics, and programming.  Led research projects funded by government grants and industry sponsors.  Published research papers in top-tier conferences and journals in the field of data science. March 2015 – January 2019 (4 years) Munich, Germany  Data Scientist Intern Siemens AG  Worked on data analysis projects related to industrial automation and manufacturing processes.  Developed predictive models to optimize production efficiency and quality control. January 2014 – January 2015 (1 year) Munich, Germany Skills   Expertise in data science, machine learning, and statistical analysis  Proficient in programming languages such as Python, R, and SQL  Strong background in academic research, publication, and grant writing  Excellent communication and presentation skills  Proven ability to mentor and supervise students and junior researchers
